Episode.GuestStars: |Ben Kronen|Benton Jennings|Bernie Hourihan|Darlene Kardon|Deanna Webb|George Wallace|Justin Grafman|Katherine Disque|Keeshan Giles|Lindsay Ravage|Maurice Warfield|Paul F. Perry|Troy Kotsur|
Episode.Overview: In the wake of Laverne's funeral, the Sacred Heart Staff decide to implement lessons from her life to their actions. Carla is upset that everyone seems to act as if nothing has changed. Dr. Cox tries to take twenty minutes for himself every day, but has great difficulty doing that. Meanwhile, the Janitor helps J.D. and Turk treat a deaf patient. And Elliot learns that Keith wants more from their relationship.
